course_title: Adult/Gerontology Acute Care Nurse Practitioner Clinical Practicum I
course_description: This course focuses on serious acute illness and exacerbation of chronic illness in adults/older adults from a systems perspective. The role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant, and interdisciplinary team member in an acute care setting is highlighted.¿¿
prerequisites: NRSG 596D prerequisite and NRSG 597D co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll in NRSG 597D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 2567, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Davey, Status: Open
